dao.name: QRY_ROUTE_MN
dao.statement: select athena_id, hotel_cod, route_cod, route_nam, ins_dat, ins_usr, upd_dat, upd_usr from route_mn where athena_id = :athena_id and trim(hotel_cod) = :hotel_cod

dao.name: QRY_ROUTE_DT
dao.statement: select athena_id, hotel_cod, route_cod, small_typ, folio_nos, master_sta, ins_dat, ins_usr, upd_dat, upd_usr from route_dt where athena_id = :athena_id and trim(hotel_cod) = :hotel_cod and route_cod = :route_cod
